body: oh boy the mc is a real dick, though this is not ntr lmao
@machan12 wtf you talking about? This isn't ntr because the mc isn't the one losing.

As a dedicated NTR hater, this isn't NTR. NTR is when a girlfriend or wife is taken. There HAS to be a relationship in place. It isn't a dude fucking your sister (incest is wrong) or mother and making them his bitches like the previous Fuetakishi series. You should hate that, but that isn't NTR. Tanaka taking the prez isn't NTR, they were never in a relationship. It's more questionable in the previous chapter, where the girl broke up with her boyfriend, then livestreamed. The relationship was cancelled before she got fucked, she chose to accept Tanaka's request to be his concubine before the sex happened, but the dude still lost her, so... Anyway, this isn't NTR.
Bro, why tf would you even upload this if the translator doesn't finish their job tf? How fucking lazy are you as a translator that you don't finish 5 fucking pages??

It's not netorare since there was no established relationship beforehand. Yeah, the dude likes the president and MC taking her while bragging is a dick move; but, liking someone doesn't mean there is cheating even if either person goes into a relationship with someone else. The artist's works aren't bad, they just go on for too long. Also, half-translation release is weird.
It's not ntr if you start reading from the first chapter.
Put the goddarn ntr tag mfs!
ntrish.....
since it's missing the ntr, i guess I need to blacklist the artist.
nice new part! very hot!

Nevermind, I think the other version is just the same without the mosaics but that is so weird cuz it changes the plot... Idk, idc, w/e... Next part 4+, keep the concubines coming (and Fuetakishi better stop re-hashing the same model)!

This type of netorare is so light like child's play. Dude, some of the dialogues has funny stuff like "personal seasoning", "freshly baked semen bread", "smell her through the screen", and the whole dumb shit plot. You don't even need to prepare for anything and if you get hurt feelings from this, boy, it's best to get yourself checked out before you even read any hentai bruh, just saying.
